254196.「『お題を見る』から 挑戦するお題を選べば\n ミーが仲間を見つけて 魔法の迷宮:
"View Themes" will let you select a theme to
challenge. I'll then send you and your
companions to the Magic Maze!
<break>

254197.<select_se_off>\nお題を見る\n迷宮の主に挑戦\n説明を聞く\n:
<select_se_off>
View Themes
Challenge Maze Boss
Explanation
<select_end><break>

254198.「お題達成の初回報酬と 初回経験値は\n お供え物を ささげた場合のみだモン！\:
You'll only get a first time clear reward if
you make an offering! Themes will be updated
the 1st and 15th of each month!
<break>

254199.「『お題に挑戦』は 必ず迷宮内でお供え物を\n ささげるモン！ 『お手伝いで行く:
If you select "Challenge Theme", you must make
an offering inside the Maze! if you choose to
help others, you don't need to offer anything!
<break>

254200.「このお題は 既に達成しているモン。\n ただ『お題に挑戦』で 迷宮の主を倒すと:
You've already gotten the clear reward for this theme. However, if you defeat the Maze Boss with "Challenge Theme", you'll get a
guaranteed four red treasure chests!

254202.「ユーは この迷宮の主の『お供え物』\n つまりコインも カードも 召喚符も メ:
You don't have anything you can offer! That's cards, coins, tags, or medals!
If you find any, please bring them to me.

254203.「聞きたい説明を 選ぶモン！\n<break>:
Choose the explanation you wanna hear!
<break>

254204.<select_se_off>\nお題の初回報酬と初回経験値\n迷宮の主に挑戦\:
<select_se_off>
First Time Reward and EXP
Challenging Maze Bosses
Losing to a Maze Boss
Rules as a Helper
<select_end><break>

254205.「ミーは あまり使わなくなった\n コインやカードを 持っている人の\n 味方な:
I'm an ally of people who have coins and cards they don't use much anymore. Coins, cards, summons, medals, etc. are all
collectively called "offerings"! On the first and fifteenth of every month, Me will issue a new challenge to defeat the Lord of the
Labyrinth! If you defeat the master of your chosen labyrinth with the offerings you've received, you'll receive two special
benefits! The first is that when you defeat the master of the labyrinth, four red treasure chests will always appear! You can
do this as many times as you want, as long as you hold it up and kill it! The second is that for each challenge you complete, you'll
receive a nice first reward and first experience from me!

254253.「『お手伝いで行く』なら\n 今のパーティから抜ける必要が あるモン！:
If you're gonna help others, then you need to
leave your current party!

254254.「お供え物は 迷宮内でささげるモン！ \n それじゃあ 一緒に行く人を\n これ:
You'll make an offering inside the Maze!
Okay! Now I just need to find others to
go together with you!

254255.「お供え物は 迷宮内でささげるモン！ \n それじゃあ ユーの 今の仲間を\n:
You'll make an offering inside the Maze!
Okay! Now I just need to find others to
go together with you and your party!

254256.「あれれ？ レベルが 足りないみたいだモン。 \n 誰かの迷宮の主を お手伝いし:
What's that? I don't think your level is high
enough. If you wanna help others, your level
has to be at least <%dW_MAX_LV>!

257821.「オーノー！ お題をド忘れしてしまったモン。\n ソーリー ちょっと 思いだすか:
Ohhh noooo! I forgot what the theme was.
Sorry... I'll think of something else. Come
back in a while.

325253.「迷宮の主を 選んで挑めるモン！\n お題じゃないから お題達成の報酬は無いモン:
You can choose any of these Maze Bosses to
challenge! It's not a theme, so you won't be
rewarded for that!
<break>

325254.「『迷宮の主に挑戦』は 必ず迷宮内でお供え物を\n ささげるモン！ 『お手伝いで:
"Challenge Maze Boss" requires you to make an
offering inside the Maze! "Help Others"
doesn't require you to offer anything!
<break>

328575.「それじゃあ 一緒に行く人を\n これから 見つけるんだモン♪:
Okay! Let me find some others to go together
with you!
